text: Braga is the third-largest city in Portugal. In 2011, it has about 182,000 inhabitants. Braga is known by the Portuguese as the religious centre of their country, this is because Braga has the oldest cathedral in Portugal and many churches. ==Gallery== Braga-Fonte do Pelicano-04-Camara Municipal-2011-gje.jpg Braga-Largo de Santiago-04-Fonte-2011-gje.jpg Braga-Arca da Porta Nova-06-2011-gje.jpg Braga- Igreja dos Congregados-06-2011-gje.jpg Braga-Largo Senhora a Branca-04-Jungvolk-2011-gje.jpg Braga-Sao Marcos-02-2011-gje.jpg Braga-Rua do Souto-04-Arca da Porta Nova-2011-gje.jpg Braga-Sao Joao do Souto-10-2011-gje.jpg ==References== Category:Cities in Portugal Category:Municipalities of Portugal Category:Braga District
title: Braga
